summary: WHILE DRIVING ABOUT 55MPH ON 95 SOUTH (4 LANES OF TRAFIC), THE FRONT OF JEEP JERK, SHUTTERING, LOUD NOICE, IMMEDIATELY LOST POWER ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. I PUSHED ON EMERGENCY BLINKERS AND STRONG ARMED JEEP ON AN ANGLE TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD. EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE TOW REQUIRED. DEALER REPORTING CATASTROPHIC ENGINE FAILURE , NOW CONFIRMED BY SECOND REGIONIAL CONSULTANT PROVIDED BY CHRYSLER EARLIER THIS WEEK. AGREED TO REPLACE ENGINE. CONCERN THAT IF CHRYSLER 3.7 ENGINES HAVE A HISTORICAL PROBLEM A RECALL SHOULD BE ISSUED.
